00013 #ifndef _WX_XML2_H_
00014 #define _WX_XML2_H_
00015 
00016 // optimization for GCC
00017 #if defined(__GNUG__) && !defined(__APPLE__)
00018 #pragma interface "xml2.h"
00019 #endif
00020 
00021 // wxWidgets headers
00022 #include "wx/string.h"
00023 #include "wx/object.h"
00024 #include "wx/wfstream.h"
00025 
00026 
00027 // Libxml2 headers: these classes wraps only libxml2 elements. You cannot
00028 // use them without libxml2 !!!!!
00029 //
00030 // To add libxml2 to your project:
00031 //   1) install libxml2 library binaries or compile them
00032 //      (you can find all the info at http://xmlsoft.org)
00033 //   2) add the include and library paths to the compiler
00034 //   3) links your progrma with the 'libxml2.lib' 
00035 //      (and 'iconv.lib' under Win32)
00036 #include <libxml/xmlmemory.h>
00037 #include <libxml/parser.h>
00038 
00039 
00040

00042 // Miscellaneous defines/macros
00043 // -------------------------------

00045 #ifdef WXXMLISDLL
00046         // if building DLL, then WX*XML*DLLEXPORT=WXDLLEXPORT...
00047         #define WXXMLDLLEXPORT          WXDLLEXPORT
00048 #else
00049         // ...otherwise 
00050         #define WXXMLDLLEXPORT          /* expand to nothing */
00051 #endif
00052 
00053 
00065 #define wxCHECK_NULL_POINTERS(x, y)             \
00066         if (x == NULL && y == NULL)                     \
00067                 return TRUE;                                    \
00068         if ((x == NULL && y != NULL) ||         \
00069                 (x != NULL && y == NULL))               \
00070                 return FALSE;
00071 
00075 #if wxUSE_UNICODE
00076 
00077         // we must use the data() function of the wxCharBuffer which is returned
00078         // by wxString::mb_str
00079         #define WX2XML(str)             ((xmlChar *)(str.mb_str(wxConvUTF8).data()))
00080 #else
00081 
00082         // wxString::mb_str will return an array of char*
00083         #define WX2XML(str)             ((xmlChar *)(str.mb_str(wxConvUTF8)))
00084 #endif
00085

00091 #define XML2WX(str)             (wxString((const char *)str, wxConvUTF8))

00114 enum wxXml2NodeType
00115 {
00116     // note: values are synchronized with xmlElementType from libxml2 2.5.x
00117         //       
00118 
00128     wxXML_ELEMENT_NODE =                1,
00129 
00131     wxXML_TEXT_NODE =                   3,
00132 
00137         wxXML_CDATA_SECTION_NODE =      4,
00138 
00144         wxXML_ENTITY_REF_NODE =         5,
00145 
00151         wxXML_PI_NODE =                         7,
00152 
00154     wxXML_COMMENT_NODE =                8,
00155 
00159     wxXML_DOCUMENT_NODE =               9,
00160     wxXML_HTML_DOCUMENT_NODE =  13,             
00161 
00162 
00166         wxXML_DTD_NODE =                        14,
00167 
00171     wxXML_ELEMENT_DECL = 15,
00172 
00176     wxXML_ATTRIBUTE_DECL = 16,
00177 
00181     wxXML_ENTITY_DECL = 17,
00182 
00183 
00187     wxXML_NAMESPACE_DECL = 18
00188 
00189         // I don't even know when these one are used... sorry
00190     //wxXML_XINCLUDE_START = 19,
00191     //wxXML_XINCLUDE_END = 20
00192 };

00194 
00198 typedef struct tagXml2BaseNode {
00199 
00200     void           *_private;   /* application data */
00201     xmlElementType   type;      /* type number, must be second ! */
00202     const xmlChar   *name;      /* the name of the node, or the entity */
00203     struct tagXml2BaseNode *children;   /* parent->childs link */
00204     struct tagXml2BaseNode *last;       /* last child link */
00205     struct tagXml2BaseNode *parent;     /* child->parent link */
00206     struct tagXml2BaseNode *next;       /* next sibling link  */
00207     struct tagXml2BaseNode *prev;       /* previous sibling link  */
00208     struct _xmlDoc  *doc;       /* the containing document */
00209 
00210 } wxXml2BaseNodeObj;
00211

00238 class WXXMLDLLEXPORT wxXml2 : public wxObject
00239 {
00240         static char m_strIndent[32];            // 32 = max indentation level.
00241         static const char *m_strOld;
00242         static int m_nOld;
00243 
00244 public:
00245         wxXml2() {}
00246         virtual ~wxXml2() {}
00247 
00250         static void Init() 
00251                 { xmlInitMemory(); xmlInitParser(); }
00252 
00256         static void Cleanup() 
00257                 { xmlCleanupParser(); }
00258                 
00261         static wxString GetLibxml2Version()
00262                 { return wxT(LIBXML_DOTTED_VERSION); }
00263                 
00266         static void TestLibxml2Version()
00267                 { LIBXML_TEST_VERSION; }
00268 
00270         static xmlGlobalState *GetGlobalState()
00271                 { return xmlGetGlobalState(); }
00272 
00275         static void SetIndentMode(bool benable = TRUE, int indentstep = 4);
00276 
00279         static void RestoreLastIndentMode();
00280 };

00290 class WXXMLDLLEXPORT wxXml2Wrapper : public wxObject
00291 {
00292         DECLARE_ABSTRACT_CLASS(wxXml2Wrapper)
00293 
00294 protected:
00295 
00299         virtual void Destroy() = 0;
00300 
00305         virtual void SetAsEmpty() = 0;
00306 
00309         /*virtual void Copy(const wxXml2Wrapper &tocopy) = 0;*/
00310 
00312         virtual int &GetPrivate() const = 0;    
00313 
00314 protected:              // reference counting utilities
00315 
00465 
00466         void ResetRefCount()
00467                 { if (IsNonEmpty()) GetPrivate() = 0; }
00468 
00469         void IncRefCount()
00470                 { if (IsNonEmpty()) GetPrivate()++; }
00471 
00472         void DecRefCount()
00473                 { if (IsNonEmpty()) GetPrivate()--; }
00474 
00475         int GetRefCount() const
00476                 { if (IsNonEmpty()) return (int)(GetPrivate()); else return 0; }
00477 
00480         void UnwrappingOld()
00481                 { DestroyIfUnlinked(); }
00482 
00485         void JustWrappedNew()
00486                 { IncRefCount(); }
00487 
00488 public:
00489 
00491         wxXml2Wrapper() {}
00492 
00497         virtual ~wxXml2Wrapper() {}
00498 
00499 
00501         virtual bool IsUnlinked() const = 0;
00502 
00504         virtual bool IsNonEmpty() const = 0;
00505 
00507         virtual void DestroyIfUnlinked();
00508 };

00516 class WXXMLDLLEXPORT wxXml2Property : public wxXml2Wrapper
00517 {
00518         DECLARE_DYNAMIC_CLASS(wxXml2Property)
00519 
00520         
00521         xmlAttr *m_attr;
00522 
00523 protected:
00524 
00525         void Destroy() {
00526                 if (m_attr) xmlRemoveProp(m_attr);
00527                 SetAsEmpty();
00528         }
00529 
00530         void SetAsEmpty()
00531                 { m_attr = NULL; }
00532 
00533         void Copy(const wxXml2Property &prop)
00534                 { UnwrappingOld(); m_attr = prop.m_attr; JustWrappedNew(); }
00535 
00536         int &GetPrivate() const
00537                 { return (int &)(m_attr->_private); }
00538 
00539 public:
00540 
00542         wxXml2Property() : m_attr(NULL) {}
00543 
00545     wxXml2Property(const wxString &name, 
00546                                         const wxString &value,
00547                                         wxXml2Node &owner = wxXml2EmptyNode) : m_attr(NULL)
00548                 { Create(name, value, owner); }
00549 
00551         wxXml2Property(xmlAttr *pattr) : m_attr(pattr) 
00552                 { JustWrappedNew(); }
00553 
00555         wxXml2Property(const wxXml2Property &prop) : m_attr(NULL)
00556                 { Copy(prop); }
00557 
00559         virtual ~wxXml2Property() { DestroyIfUnlinked(); }
00560 
00561 
00562 public:         // operators
00563 
00566         bool operator==(const wxXml2Property &p) const;
00567         
00569         bool operator!=(const wxXml2Property &p) const          { return !(*this == p); }
00570 
00572         wxXml2Property &operator=(const wxXml2Property &p)
00573                 { Copy(p); return *this; }
00574 
00575 public:         // miscellaneous
00576 
00578         void Create(const wxString &name, 
00579                                 const wxString &value,
00580                                 wxXml2Node &owner = wxXml2EmptyNode);
00581     
00583         bool IsUnlinked() const;
00584 
00586         bool IsNonEmpty() const
00587                 { return m_attr != NULL; }
00588 
00589 
00590 public:         // getters
00591 
00592     wxString GetName() const
00593                 { if (m_attr) return XML2WX(m_attr->name); return wxEmptyString; }
00594     wxString GetValue() const
00595                 { if (m_attr->children) return XML2WX(m_attr->children->content); return wxEmptyString; }
00596 
00597     wxXml2Property GetNext() const
00598                 { if (m_attr) return wxXml2Property(m_attr->next); return wxXml2EmptyProperty; }
00599         wxXml2Property GetPrevious() const
00600                 { if (m_attr) return wxXml2Property(m_attr->prev); return wxXml2EmptyProperty; }
00601 
00602         wxXml2Node GetOwner() const;    // cannot be implemented here: wxXml2Node not defined yet
00603 
00605         xmlAttr *GetObj() const
00606                 { return m_attr; }
00607         
00608 
00609 public:         // setters    
00610 
00611     void SetValue(const wxString &value);
00612     void SetName(const wxString &name);
00613 
00614     void SetNext(wxXml2Property &next);
00615         void SetPrevious(wxXml2Property &prev);
00616 
00618         void SetOwner(wxXml2Node &owner);
00619 };

00638 class WXXMLDLLEXPORT wxXml2Namespace : public wxXml2Wrapper
00639 {
00640         DECLARE_DYNAMIC_CLASS(wxXml2Namespace)
00641 
00642         
00643         xmlNs *m_ns;
00644 
00649         xmlNode *m_owner;
00650 
00651 protected:
00652 
00653         void Destroy() {
00654                 if (m_ns) xmlFreeNs(m_ns);
00655                 SetAsEmpty();
00656         }
00657 
00658         void SetAsEmpty()
00659                 { m_ns = NULL; }
00660 
00661         void Copy(const wxXml2Namespace &ns) {
00662                 UnwrappingOld();
00663                 m_ns = ns.m_ns;
00664                 m_owner = ns.m_owner;
00665                 JustWrappedNew();
00666         }
00667 
00668         int &GetPrivate() const
00669                 { return (int &)(m_ns->_private); }
00670 
00671 public:
00672 
00674         wxXml2Namespace() : m_ns(NULL), m_owner(NULL) {}
00675 
00679     wxXml2Namespace(const wxString &prefix, const wxString &uri,
00680                                         wxXml2Node &owner = wxXml2EmptyNode) : m_ns(NULL), m_owner(NULL)
00681                 { Create(prefix, uri, owner); }
00682 
00684         wxXml2Namespace(xmlNs *ns, wxXml2Node &owner);
00685 
00687         wxXml2Namespace(const wxXml2Namespace &ns) : m_ns(NULL), m_owner(NULL)
00688                 { Copy(ns); }
00689 
00692     virtual ~wxXml2Namespace() { DestroyIfUnlinked(); }
00693 
00694 
00695 public:         // operators
00696 
00697         bool operator==(const wxXml2Namespace &ns) const;
00698         bool operator!=(const wxXml2Namespace &p) const         { return !(*this == p); }
00699         
00700         wxXml2Namespace &operator=(const wxXml2Namespace &n)
00701                 { Copy(n); return *this; }
00702 
00703 public:         // miscellaneous
00704 
00706         void Create(const wxString &prefix, const wxString &uri, wxXml2Node &owner);
00707         
00712         bool IsUnlinked() const
00713                 { return (m_owner == NULL) || (m_ns == NULL); }
00714 
00716         bool IsNonEmpty() const
00717                 { return m_ns != NULL; }
00718 
00719 
00720 public:         // getters
00721     
00722         wxString GetPrefix() const
00723                 { if (m_ns) return XML2WX(m_ns->prefix); return wxEmptyString; }
00724     wxString GetURI() const
00725                 { if (m_ns) return XML2WX(m_ns->href); return wxEmptyString; }  
00726 
00728         xmlNs *GetObj() const
00729                 { return m_ns; }
00730         
00731 public:         // setters
00732 
00733     void SetPrefix(const wxString &p);
00734     void SetURI(const wxString &u);
00735 };

00939                 { m_obj = NULL; }

00944                 JustWrappedNew();

00948                 { return (int &)(m_obj->_private); }

00972                 { Copy(decl); return *this; }

00975 public:         // getters
00976 
00982

00984                 { return (wxXml2NodeType)((int)m_obj->type); }
00985     wxXml2BaseNode GetParent() const
00986                 { if (m_obj) return wxXml2BaseNode(m_obj->parent); return wxXml2EmptyBaseNode; }
00987     wxXml2BaseNode GetChildren() const          
00988                 { if (m_obj) return wxXml2BaseNode(m_obj->children); return wxXml2EmptyBaseNode; }
00989     wxXml2BaseNode GetFirstChild() const        
00990                 { return GetChildren(); }
00991     wxXml2BaseNode GetNext() const              
00992                 { if (m_obj) return wxXml2BaseNode(m_obj->next); return wxXml2EmptyBaseNode; }
00993         wxXml2BaseNode GetPrevious() const      
00994                 { if (m_obj) return wxXml2BaseNode(m_obj->prev); return wxXml2EmptyBaseNode; }
00995 
00996         wxXml2BaseNodeObj *GetObj() const
00997                 { return m_obj; }
00998 
01000 
01001 
01002 public:         // setters
01003 
01008 
01009     void SetType(wxXml2NodeType type)
01010                 { m_obj->type = (xmlElementType)((int)type); }
01011 
01012     void SetChildren(const wxXml2BaseNode &child);
01013     void SetNext(const wxXml2BaseNode &next);
01014         void SetPrevious(const wxXml2BaseNode &prev);

01027 class WXXMLDLLEXPORT wxXml2Node : public wxXml2BaseNode
01028 {
01029         DECLARE_DYNAMIC_CLASS(wxXml2Node)
01030 
01031 protected:
01032 
01037         void Build(const wxXml2NodeType type,
01038                                 wxXml2Node &parent,
01039                                 wxXml2Document &document = wxXml2EmptyDoc, 
01040                                 wxXml2Namespace &ns = wxXml2EmptyNamespace,
01041                                 const wxString &name = wxEmptyString, 
01042                                 const wxString &content = wxEmptyString,
01043                                 wxXml2Property &props = wxXml2EmptyProperty, 
01044                                 wxXml2Node &next = wxXml2EmptyNode,
01045                                 wxXml2Node &previous = wxXml2EmptyNode,
01046                                 wxXml2Node &children = wxXml2EmptyNode);
01047 
01049         void Destroy() {
01050                 xmlUnlinkNode((xmlNode *)m_obj);
01051                 xmlFreeNode((xmlNode *)m_obj);
01052                 SetAsEmpty();
01053         }
01054 
01055 
01056 public:
01057 
01060         wxXml2Node() {
01061                 // before this node can be used it must be constructed through
01062                 // Create****() functions. See below.
01063                 m_obj = NULL;
01064         }
01065 
01071     wxXml2Node(wxXml2Document &doc,
01072                                 const wxString &name = wxEmptyString, 
01073                                 wxXml2Namespace &ns = wxXml2EmptyNamespace)
01074                 { CreateRoot(doc, name, ns); }
01075 
01077     wxXml2Node(wxXml2NodeType type,
01078                                 wxXml2Node &parent,
01079                                 const wxString &name, 
01080                                 const wxString &content = wxEmptyString,
01081                                 wxXml2Namespace &ns = wxXml2EmptyNamespace)
01082                 { CreateChild(type, parent, name, content, ns); }
01083 
01086     wxXml2Node(wxXml2NodeType type, wxXml2Document &doc,
01087                                 const wxString &name = wxEmptyString, 
01088                                 const wxString &content = wxEmptyString,
01089                                 wxXml2Namespace &ns = wxXml2EmptyNamespace)
01090                 { CreateTemp(type, doc, name, content, ns);     }
01091 
01094         wxXml2Node(xmlNode *node)
01095                 { m_obj = (wxXml2BaseNodeObj *)node; JustWrappedNew(); }
01096 
01098         wxXml2Node(const wxXml2Node &n)
01099                 { Copy(n); }
01100 
01102         wxXml2Node(const wxXml2BaseNode &n)
01103                 { m_obj = n.GetObj(); JustWrappedNew(); }
01104 
01105         virtual ~wxXml2Node() { DestroyIfUnlinked(); }
01106 
01107 
01108 public:         // operators
01109

01111         bool operator!=(const wxXml2Node &p) const                              { return !(*this == p); }
01112         
01113         wxXml2Node &operator=(const wxXml2Node &n)
01114                 { Copy(n); return *this; }
01115
